column6: providence. he was the beloved husband of thirty-six years to manishag (dakessian) dermenjian. born in lattakia
column8: he was a son of the late artin and hripsime (topjian) dermenjian. jean was a welder for anvil international of north kingstown for twenty years before his retirement. besides his wife he is survived by his loving children
column11: and jacques j. dermenjian of providence. jean was the cherished grandfather of michael v. vartaniuan. he was the brother of avedis dermenjian of lattakia
column17: kevork dermenjian. his funeral service will be held on monday at 2:00 p. m. in the nardolillo funeral home & crematory
column19: cranston. visiting hours monday 12:00 noon until the time of service at 2:00 p. m. burial will be private. condolences. click here to send a condolence lena vartanian. boca raton
column22: 2015 my deepest condolences to the dermenjian family. may god bless his soul. he will always be in our hearts. lena vartanian. edythe manning. warwick friendsunday
